code: import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const OrderSummary=_ref=>{let{cartItems,onPlaceOrder,onBackToCart}=_ref;const total=cartItems.reduce((sum,item)=>sum+(item.product.price.main*100+item.product.price.fractional)*item.quantity/100,0);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Order Summary"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:onBackToCart,children:"Back to Cart"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:cartItems.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:item.product.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Quantity: ",item.quantity]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Price: $",item.product.price.main,".",item.product.price.fractional.toString().padStart(2,"0")]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Subtotal: $",(item.quantity*(item.product.price.main*100+item.product.price.fractional)/100).toFixed(2)]})]},item.product.id))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{children:["Total: $",total.toFixed(2)]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:onPlaceOrder,children:"Place Order"})]});};export default OrderSummary;
